类 PhD

  • java.lang.Object
    • PhD

  • public class PhD
extends java.lang.Object
    NetId: zg242.sz499 Time spent: 6 hours, 30 minutes. An instance maintains info about the PhD of a person.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PhD(java.lang.String n, int m, int y)
      Constructor: an instance for a person with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y.
      PhD(java.lang.String n, int m, int y, PhD adv1)
      Constructor: a PhD with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y, first advisor adv1, and no second advisor.
      PhD(java.lang.String n, int m, int y, PhD adv1, PhD adv2)
      Constructor: a PhD with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y, first advisor adv1, and second advisor adv2.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PhD advisor1()
      Return the first advisor of this PhD (null if unknown).
      PhD advisor2()
      Return the second advisor of this PhD (null if unknown or non-existent).
      boolean areSiblings(PhD p)
      Return value of "this person and p are intellectual siblings."
      boolean gotAfter(PhD p)
      Return value of "p is not null and this person got the PhD after p.”
      boolean hasAdvisee()
      Return value of "this PhD has at least one advisee", i.e. true if this PhD has at least one advisee and false otherwise"
      int month()
      Return the month this person got their PhD.
      java.lang.String name()
      Return the name of this person.
      int numAdvisees()
      Return the number of PhD advisees of this person.
      void setAdvisor1(PhD p)
      Add p as the first advisor of this person.
      void setAdvisor2(PhD p)
      Add p as the second advisor of this person.
      int year()
      Return the year this person got their PhD.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PhD

        public PhD(java.lang.String n,
           int m,
           int y)
        Constructor: an instance for a person with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y. Its advisors are unknown, and it has no advisees. Precondition: n has at least 1 char and m is in 1..12.

      • PhD

        public PhD(java.lang.String n,
           int m,
           int y,
           PhD adv1)
        Constructor: a PhD with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y, first advisor adv1, and no second advisor. Precondition: n has at least 1 char, m is in 1..12, and adv is not null.

      • PhD

        public PhD(java.lang.String n,
           int m,
           int y,
           PhD adv1,
           PhD adv2)
        Constructor: a PhD with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y, first advisor adv1, and second advisor adv2. Precondition: n has at least 1 char, m is in 1..12, adv1 and adv2 are not null, and adv1 and adv2 are different.

    • 方法详细资料

      • name

        public java.lang.String name()
        Return the name of this person.

      • month

        public int month()
        Return the month this person got their PhD.

      • year

        public int year()
        Return the year this person got their PhD.

      • advisor1

        public PhD advisor1()
        Return the first advisor of this PhD (null if unknown).

      • advisor2

        public PhD advisor2()
        Return the second advisor of this PhD (null if unknown or non-existent).

      • numAdvisees

        public int numAdvisees()
        Return the number of PhD advisees of this person.

      • setAdvisor1

        public void setAdvisor1(PhD p)
        Add p as the first advisor of this person. Precondition: the first advisor is unknown and p is not null.

      • setAdvisor2

        public void setAdvisor2(PhD p)
        Add p as the second advisor of this person. Precondition: The first advisor (of this person) is known, the second advisor is unknown, p is not null, and p is different from the first advisor.

      • hasAdvisee

        public boolean hasAdvisee()
        Return value of "this PhD has at least one advisee", i.e. true if this PhD has at least one advisee and false otherwise"

      • gotAfter

        public boolean gotAfter(PhD p)
        Return value of "p is not null and this person got the PhD after p.”

      • areSiblings

        public boolean areSiblings(PhD p)
        Return value of "this person and p are intellectual siblings." Precondition: p is not null.
